scripts.commit_readme_doc_changes: git add docs/** *.md ; git commit -m "readme/doc" ; echo "commit readme doc done"
scripts.demo.react.android.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-react && ns run android --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.react.ios.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-react && ns run ios --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.svelte.android.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-svelte && ns run android --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.svelte.ios.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-svelte && ns run ios --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.vue.android.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-vue && ns run android --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.demo.vue.ios.dev: npm run build && cd ./demo-vue && ns run ios --no-hmr --env.development
scripts.publish: npm run setup && npm run clean && npm run build.all && npm run readme && npm run doc && npm run commit_readme_doc_changes && lerna publish
